description: A product page with a countdown to christmas sales on top, made with React.
A calculator made with React, thanks to Tyler Potts.
A weather app made with React, thanks to Udemy again.

A Food Management app made with React that makes calls to the spoonacular API and renders the searched recipes to the user, letting him add some to favorites, search through favorites and change the color theme of the app. Deployed with Firebase.
A simple app that calculate your age, made in vanilla JS and Tailwind CSS from a frontendmentor challenge. Deployed with Render as usual
A form that checks the validity of the card infos, displays a success page if right and dynamically displays the infos on the card. Made with vanilla JS and deployed on render.
Static landing page for a booking agency, simple plain HTML/CSS project.
Dynamic architect portfolio with authentification and add/remove function for projects. A great challenge of using vanilla JS, showed me the limits of not using a framework too.
Planification of a menu making app for food profesionnals. My first experience as a project manager, it helped me grow my problem solving skills at a large scale.
Debug and optimization (performances, SEO, accessibility) of a photographer portfolio. So glad to have learned about the principles of natural SEO and its entanglement with performances.
Dynamic SPA of a rental agency made with React. Challenged my knowledge of frontend development and taught me the basics of React.
Backend of a book rating app made with Node.js, Express and MongoDB. It taught me how deal with authentication, basic security and CRUD operations.
